article: Many people don't like to stay at home on holidays.  _  often want to go out to see something  _  or something exciting. So people from the country come to the city and people from the city go to the country for holidays. On holidays,  _  , buses and planes are all very busy. Many people take cars or buses for holidays  _  it is hard to buy train tickets and plane tickets. Last May Day my family went to the country by  _  for our holiday. There was too much traffic on the  _  , so we moved very slowly. It took  _  about an hour to get out of the town. After some time, we came to a hill. It was great and beautiful. This was a(n)  _  place for a picnic , so we stopped and took the food, fruit and drinks out of the car. We sat down and began to  _  . Soon it started to rain. We had to run  _  to our car and have our picnic in the car. Then we drove back home. What a bad trip!
